basics.name: Steffen Weidenhaus
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Highly motivated senior software engineer with proven expertise in intelligence systems, cybersecurity, and AI/ML technologies, seeking to contribute technical excellence to Australia's public sector. Demonstrated track record delivering mission-critical applications for intelligence operations, large-scale security systems protecting millions of users, and advanced geospatial analysis tools supporting strategic decision-making. Combines deep technical leadership experience from multinational enterprise environments with direct intelligence sector collaboration, offering unique capability to architect and deliver sophisticated systems that enhance operational effectiveness and situational awareness in high-stakes defence environments.

work.name: Rhize Manufacturing Data Hub
work.summary: High-Performance Manufacturing Intelligence Systems Develop mission-critical web applications using React and TypeScript with Tailwind CSS, delivering robust and responsive interfaces that integrate seamlessly with high-performance GraphQL backend APIs built in Go.
highlights: Engineer scalable solutions for complex manufacturing data environments
Architect and implement sophisticated data pipeline solutions enabling secure processing of sensitive manufacturing datasets
Deploy systematic quality assurance protocols achieving optimal code coverage

work.name: Australian Research Data Commons (ARDC)
work.summary: Led front-end development for a critical research activity platform serving Australia's national research infrastructure, implementing robust identity and access management systems using Keycloak integration.
highlights: Architected secure authentication workflows incorporating ORCID, Australian Access Federation, and Google OAuth 2
Delivered comprehensive full-stack solution utilising React, Material UI, and Java Spring Boot with PostgreSQL
Built scalable cloud infrastructure supporting national research coordination efforts

work.name: Linktree
work.summary: Led critical user experience initiatives for a platform serving over 50 million users, developing scalable and reusable UI components that enhanced system reliability and user engagement.
highlights: Engineered comprehensive cybersecurity automation systems to proactively identify vulnerabilities
Developed sophisticated scripts for automated detection of AWS configuration security issues
Delivered measurable improvements in system security through automated processes

work.name: Weidenhaus Consulting
work.summary: Delivered high-impact software engineering solutions for multinational corporations including eBay and SAP, developing sophisticated web applications and system integrations.
highlights: Successfully managed multiple concurrent client engagements
Maintained rigorous quality standards and stakeholder coordination requirements

work.name: Arup Australia Service
work.summary: Architected and delivered multiple AWS-hosted backend applications with integrated database solutions, providing robust and scalable APIs that support mission-critical infrastructure operations.
highlights: Developed sophisticated mapping tools and spatial analysis capabilities

work.name: SAP SE
work.summary: Led development of company-wide reporting infrastructure integrating multiple disparate systems, managing platforms processing millions of data records with high operational availability requirements.
highlights: Developed comprehensive market penetration analysis application
Architected 360-degree customer intelligence dashboard integrating hundreds of strategic data points

volunteer.summary: Partnered with intelligence sector professionals to architect and deliver a critical map-centric application supporting Humanitarian Assistance and Disaster Relief operations.
highlights: Built scalable AWS cloud infrastructure utilising DynamoDB, CloudFormation, and Lambda functions
Engineered sophisticated large language model integration to process and analyse intelligence from diverse sources
